name: backend
description: CeraUI backend - Node.js/Bun server for CERALIVE/BELABOX live streaming hardware
author: Andr√©s Cera

scripts.build: rm -rf ../../dist/ && bash -c 'BUN_TARGET=${BUILD_ARCH:-arm64}; case $BUN_TARGET in amd64) BUN_TARGET="bun-linux-x64" ;; arm64) BUN_TARGET="bun-linux-arm64" ;; *) echo "Unsupported architecture: $BUN_TARGET"; exit 1 ;; esac; bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=$BUN_TARGET src/belaUI.ts --outfile ../../dist/belaUI' && cd ../.. && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend-only: rm -rf ../../dist/belaUI ../../dist/deployment && bash -c 'BUN_TARGET=${BUILD_ARCH:-arm64}; case $BUN_TARGET in amd64) BUN_TARGET="bun-linux-x64" ;; arm64) BUN_TARGET="bun-linux-arm64" ;; *) echo "Unsupported architecture: $BUN_TARGET"; exit 1 ;; esac; bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --bytecode --target=$BUN_TARGET src/belaUI.ts --outfile ../../dist/belaUI'
scripts.lint: echo 'Backend linting handled by root Biome'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Backend fixing handled by root Biome'
